title: In Malliotakis vs. Rose Rematch, a Democrat Diverges From Party Orthodoxy
description: The race between Representative Nicole Malliotakis, a Republican, and Max Rose, a Democrat, is a rare look at how national political campaign themes are playing in New York.
dc:creator: Michael Gold
media:credit: Ahmed Gaber for The New York Times
media:description: Max Rose has attempted to separate himself from Democratic orthodoxy, even as he tries to reclaim his former seat from Ms. Malliotakis, the Republican incumbent.
